wikipedia_page.main: Herbert Delauney Hughes (7 September 1914 – 15 November 1995), known as Billy Hughes, was a British adult educationist and Labour Party politician. He was a member of parliament (MP) from 1945 to 1950 and principal of Ruskin College from 1950 to 1979.

link_mentions.page: List of MPs elected in the 1945 United Kingdom general election

response: * Billy Hughes (1914–1995), educationist and politician, Principal of Ruskin College, Oxford, 1950–1979
* Billy Hughes, Labour MP from 1945–50 for Wolverhampton West and educator
*Billy Hughes (1945–1950), later Principal of Ruskin College.
